org.androidpn.server.xmpp.net
类 IoBufferWriter

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Writer
      org.androidpn.server.xmpp.net.IoBufferWriter
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
public class IoBufferWriter
extends java.io.Writer

Wrapper on a MINA IoBuffer that extends the Writer class.

作者：
Sehwan Noh (devnoh@gmail.com)

方法详细信息

write

public void write(char[] cbuf,
                  int off,
                  int len)
           throws java.io.IOException
Writes a portion of an array of characters.

指定者：
类 java.io.Writer 中的 write
参数：
cbuf - Array of characters
off - Offset from which to start writing characters
len - Number of characters to write
抛出：
java.io.IOException
